description:
Clean bikes work better! This concentrated cleaner can be mixed with water for standard cleaning or used undiluted as a degreaser.

  • Formula removes grime without damaging your bike's finish
  • Mix 1 part gel with 3 parts water for spray cleaner
  • Alkaline based solution is free of acids, CFC and solvents
  • Safe on all types of bike and surfaces, including disc brake rotors and pads
name: Muc-Off Nano Tech Concentrated Gel Bike Cleaner
